attributes.action: Make St. George's day a national holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Making St Georges day a national holiday and giving every one a day off would be awesome. My birthday is on this boring day, all that happens is the scouts do a parade. If we had the day off it would be such good fun. sign up get a much needed day off.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
